players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Everyone, I investigated Diana last night and discovered she's the mafioso. We must vote her out to save the town!"
Diana: "Charlie, that's a bold claim to make so early! If you're really the detective, why would you expose yourself immediately? This seems like a desperate mafia play to me."
You: "I think we should hear more before deciding. Charlie, why did you investigate Diana specifically?"
Charlie: "I investigated Diana because her demeanor seemed off from the beginning, and as the detective, I had to follow my instincts. Let's vote her out before she strikes again!"

Diana: "Charlie's story doesn't add up - a real detective wouldn't reveal themselves this recklessly on Day 1 with no proof. Alice, think about it - he's trying to rush us into a vote without any real discussion!"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
